ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, no... I m saying you cannot squeeze that many more people into one fight.  They are making it so you need more and more people to do certain things.
ygData.messageBody:
> at it) By the time we get there, there will be no chance. We will not
> be lvl 50 before expansion, I cant imagine what Verant is going to do to
> all those guys then...

No, no... I'm saying you cannot squeeze that many more people into
one fight. They are making it so you need more and more people to
do certain things. And it will come to a point where you bring so
many people who are needed to do a dragon, that they all will go
linkdead. Verant cannot keep upping the dragons like this, next
thing you know the dragons will be shouting out people's names.

If you bring 24 elite L50s to a dragon fight in full planar armor
and resist gear, you had damn well better win. Verant completely
plays down the fact that L50s are the highest and most experienced
players in the world. I should be like Bard from the Hobbit.
Oops, I don't get Archery... nm. heh.

> leveling people. To be honest all the high levels being bored is
> speeding my level progress right now, as they are often around to help
> me when I do something stupid (like die deep in Befallen) and they (at
> least for me) are often genrorous with equipment...

It seems that's all I've been really doing lately in my spare time.
Helping out people. Handing out bronze and money. Doing quests
for people who are less fortunate. Can't really buff people, but
I can hang around and make sure the little peeps are doing ok.
I'll camp permafrost and grab some coronets and pass them out to
monks, or some axes/blades to younger bards who show great prospect.

I have the items to make Lambent Gauntlets, anyone here need them
on Innoruuk?

Harmonic.
